Column1: Southee to Rayudu, 1 run, slower ball, tapped towards backward point, Dhawan charges to the striker's end and that's the victory for India
Southee to Rayudu, no run, opens the face of the bat and guides it to backward point
Southee to Rayudu, no run, good length delivery on the off stump, Rayudu defends

Southee to Rayudu, FOUR, finally Rayudu connects with an attempted big hit, steps down the pitch to this full ball outside off stump, enough width to free the arms and go hard on the lofted drive, still not exactly from the middle of the bat, but good enough
Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, neatly driven off the front foot and wide of long-off, Rayudu has an opportunity to get the timing right. Can he finish off well?
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, Rayudu can't hit it in the gap after advancing to this good length delivery, pushed towards cover
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, short delivery on the off stump, Rayudu thinks about the pull and withdraws the bat late
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, fullish delivery around the off stump, Rayudu defends
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, slower delivery outside off stump, Rayudu tries to cut and chops it into the off-side
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, wide, short and down the leg-side, Rayudu tries to help it on its way and misses
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, short of length delivery on the off stump, Rayudu goes back and knocks it towards mid-wicket, loud call for no
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, worked away to deep mid-wicket
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, shortish delivery on the stumps, Dhawan tries to defend, the ball rolls to third man off the handle
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, full delivery around the off stump, Dhawan tries to drive and gets an inside edge onto pad
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, 1 run, tucked to backward square leg, they are taking off for a quick single, direct-hit but Dhawan was home
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, no run, Rayudu jumps down the pitch and tries to swing hard, the ball almost takes out the sticks
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, shortish delivery outside off stump, Dhawan goes back and guides it to third man
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, shortish delivery around the off stump, Dhawan defends off the back foot
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, on a good length and at the stumps, Rayudu opens himself slightly and defends it back at the bowler
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, short of a length and on Dhawan's hips, nudged past square leg for a single
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 2 runs, short and well outside off, Dhawan swivels across, rolls his wrists and pulls it in front of square on the on-side for a couple of runs
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, no run, the slower ball from Bracewell, Dhawan leans forward and finds the fielder at backward point with the dab
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, no run, back of a length and just outside off, Dhawan plays with an open face and finds backward point

Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, no run, short of a length and at the stumps, Dhawan brought his bat down at an angle, clipped the inside edge, brushed the right thigh and dropped wide of the leg-stump, Rayudu wanted a single and is sent abck
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, slower delivery outside off stump, Dhawan goes back and punches it to deep cover
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, 1 run, "yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah," is the shout from Rayudu immediately after pushing this good length delivery towards cover
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, no run, this time he connects with the drive, but only manages to hit it to the left of the man at cover
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, no run, short of length delivery outside off stump, Rayudu tries to drive and gets beaten, feet not really there
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, no run, front foot stride and then a firm push to cover, can't hit the gap, Dhawan rushes back as Rayudu says no for a quick single and rightly so
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, very full and on the leg stump, Dhawan flicks it towards deep square leg
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, short of length delivery around the off stump, Rayudu defends off the back foot
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, fullish and outside off stump, defended
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, full and outside off stump, Rayudu lets it pass
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, no run, short of length delivery on the off stump, Rayudu defends off the back foot
Doug Bracewell to Rayudu, 2 runs, shortish and on the leg stump, knocked towards deep mid-wicket
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, slapped away to sweeper cover
Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, no run, short of length delivery outside off stump, Rayudu tries to dab and misses

Lockie Ferguson to Rayudu, FOUR, outside edge but it goes between the keeper and the man at wide slip, good length delivery outside off stump, Rayudu tries to defend away from the body and gets an edge that perfectly escapes through the gap

Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, out Caught by Latham!! Appeal for caught behind and Kohli walks. So how crucial was that excellent bit of fielding by Lockie Ferguson and the man at mid-on the previous ball. He was denied a run and now Lockie Ferguson has the wicket next ball. Short delivery, surprising Kohli with pace and also cramping him for room on the pull shot, gets a glove on it (or rather a top edge as the replay confirms) and the ball goes straight to the keeper. Kohli c Latham b Lockie Ferguson 45(59) [4s-3]
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, no run, very full, driven hard to mid-on, the bowler gets a hand on it and deflects it to mid-on, it's a dot in the end
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, no run, driven to mid-off
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, shortish delivery outside off stump, Dhawan cuts it to sweeper cover
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, shortish delivery on the stumps, Dhawan goes back and pulls it to long-on
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, very full and on the leg stump, Kohli drives it to long-on
Santner to Kohli, no run, fullish and around the off stump, Kohli drives it to mid-off
Santner to Kohli, 2 runs, flighted delivery outside off stump, Kohli tries to drive and gets a thick edge that rolls to deep backward point
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, very full and on Dhawan's pads, nudged wide of mid-wicket for a single
Santner to Dhawan, no run, tossed up slower and just outside off, defended to the on-side
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, fuller length delivery on Dhawan's pads, whipped in front of square on the on-side for a single
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, 1 run, short of a good length and just outside off, Kohli plays with an angled bat and runs it down to third man
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, no run, fuller length delivery and well wide of off, driven straight to the fielder at cover
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, short and wide of off, Dhawan reaches out and cuts it square past cover for a single
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, tad fuller and on Dhawan's pads, clipped straight to the fielder at mid-wicket
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, slower back of a length delivery outside off, dabbed with an open face towards backward point
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, fraction short and wide of off, Dhawan leans forward and then cuts it square past point for a single
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, slower and wider of off, eased into the gap wide of cover for a single
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, dropped short and wide of off, cracked square on the off-side for a single
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, Santner gives this one plenty of air, eased down towards long-on for a single
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, flighted on the leg-stump line, clipped backward of square on the on-side for a single
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, pushed through on the leg-stump line, nudged behind square on the on-side for a single
Southee to Kohli, 1 run, on a good length and just outside off, Kohli works it wide of mid-wicket for a single
Southee to Kohli, no run, tad fuller and just outside off, Kohli leans forward and finds mid-off with the drive

Southee to Kohli, no run, Kohli has been given OUT LBW and he wants a review. It's a fair delivery, think there's no bat on that, but is it going over the stumps. HotSpot doesn't reveal anything, but there's a spike on the RTS when the ball went past the bat. Nigel Llong is happy with what he has seen and the decision has been overturned. NOT OUT is the call. Kohli survives, he was quick to review and think he knew he might have got an inside edge. On a length and slanting into the right-hander, Kohli slightly fell over on the flick and was rapped on the pads - in front of middle and leg
Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, low full toss, Dhawan drives it towards cover
Southee to Dhawan, no run, shortish delivery around the off stump, Dhawan cuts to deep backward point
Southee to Dhawan, no run, short of length delivery angled in, Dhawan looks to cut and misses as it is too close to the body, had no room for the shot
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, turned to square leg off the front foot
Santner to Dhawan, 2 runs, looked like the attempted carrom ball on the shorter side, lot of width, Dhawan cuts and sends it to deep cover
Santner to Dhawan, no run, flicked to the left of mid-wicket, who dives and stops the ball
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, nicely floated up on the stumps, Kohli drills it hard to long-on
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, flighted delivery on the stumps, Dhawan drives it towards mid-off
Santner to Dhawan, no run, flighted delivery on the leg stump, Dhawan works it away towards mid-wicket
Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, punched square of the wicket on the off-side

Southee to Dhawan, 2 runs, this time Dhawan drives to the right of the diving fielder at cover, the man in the deep tidies up, 26th ODI fifty for Dhawan, he's looked solid after that initial new ball burst from Boult and Southee
Southee to Dhawan, no run, crunchy cover drive, but straight to the man at cover, landed in the slot for Dhawan to cream that ball, didn't get the placement right
Southee to Dhawan, no run, short of length delivery on the stumps, Dhawan defends it towards mid-wicket
Southee to Kohli, 1 run, good length delivery just outside off stump, Kohli knocks it to the right of mid-wicket and he races off
Southee to Kohli, no run, short of length delivery on the off stump, Kohli goes back and pushes it to mid-on
Santner to Dhawan, no run, on the leg stump, Dhawan defends it into the on-side
Santner to Dhawan, no run, pushed into the off-side
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, nice and full from Santner, Kohli drives it along the ground to long-off
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, tossed up on the stumps, Dhawan drives it to long-on
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, fullish delivery outside off stump, Kohli leans forward and drives it to sweeper cover
Santner to Kohli, no run, flighted delivery, blocked
Boult to Kohli, 3 runs, short delivery again, Kohli pulls it wide of deep mid-wicket this time
Boult to Dhawan, 1 run, slower delivery outside off stump, Dhawan drives it square of the wicket on the off-side
Boult to Dhawan, no run, very full and on the stumps, Dhawan gets an inside edge onto pad
Boult to Kohli, 1 run, shortish delivery on the leg stump, Kohli pulls to deep mid-wicket
Boult to Dhawan, 1 run, shortish delivery outside off stump, Dhawan reaches out for the cut shot and toe-ends it to third man
Boult to Dhawan, no run, good length delivery outside off stump, Dhawan leans forward and drives it square towards backward point
Santner to Kohli, no run, flighted delivery outside off stump, Kohli opens the face of the bat and guides it towards backward point
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, goes back and pushes the ball wide of long-on for an easy run
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, flighted delivery on the leg stump, Kohli drives it to long-on
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, very full and on the stumps, Dhawan drives it towards long-on
Santner to Dhawan, no run, Dhawan jumps down the pitch, but Santner drops it short and forces the batsman to defend
Santner to Dhawan, no run, driven back to the bowler
Boult to Kohli, no run, short of length delivery outside off stump, Kohli dabs it towards the man at wide slip
Boult to Kohli, no run, slower delivery outside off stump, Kohli leans forward and defends it towards backward point
Boult to Dhawan, 1 run, flicked away towards deep mid-wicket
Boult to Dhawan, no run, yorker, lovely yorker, on the stumps, Dhawan digs it out after moving his legs
Boult to Dhawan, no run, good length delivery on the off stump, Dhawan defends
Boult to Kohli, 1 run, way too short but not high enough to trouble Kohli, easily pulled away to deep mid-wicket, just a run though
Santner to Dhawan, no run, shortish delivery on the leg stump, Dhawan knocks it towards mid-wicket
Santner to Dhawan, no run, flighted delivery on the leg stump, Dhawan flicks it towards mid-wicket
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, forward defended to the right of backward point for a quick single
Santner to Kohli, no run, flighted delivery outside off stump, Kohli pushes it towards cover
Santner to Kohli, no run, driven off the front foot to cover
Santner to Kohli, no run, fullish delivery outside off stump, Kohli guides it to backward point, tried to use the pace on the ball and send it fine but found the fielder
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, short of length delivery on the stumps, Kohli goes back and turns it to deep backward square leg
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, short of length delivery outside off stump, Dhawan punches it to sweeper-cover
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, wide, short and on the stumps, Dhawan lets it pass, too high according to the ump and rightly so
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, slower delivery on the off stump, Kohli dabs it towards third man
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, good length delivery outside off stump, Dhawan cuts it square of the wicket on the off-side
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, tad fuller and on Kohli's pads, clipped past square leg for a single
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, short of a length and at the stumps, defended towards the on-side
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, pushed through on off, worked away towards long-on for a single

Santner to Kohli, FOUR, just wide of cover, nicely tossed up and might have gripped the surface a bit, drew Kohli into the drive, he didn't get it off the meat of the blade, sliced it slightly but managed to find the gap wide of Southee - who dived to his right
Santner to Kohli, no run, tossed up on the leg-stump line, nudged towards mid-wicket
Santner to Dhawan, 1 run, very full and just outside off, eased down towards long-off for a single
Santner to Dhawan, wide, fraction quicker, but still sliding down leg, another extra added to the total
Santner to Dhawan, wide, not the line KW wants his bowler to bowl, full and sliding down leg, called as a wide
Santner to Kohli, 1 run, fraction too short from Santner, allows Kohli to go back and work it to long-on
Santner to Kohli, no run, pushed through flatter and wider of off, Kohli was looking to cut and missed
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, full and on Dhawan's pads, he was a tad too late on the flick, gets an inside edge that rolls back to the bowler off his pads
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, short of a length and at the stumps, might have been another slower ball, Dhawan was way too early on the pull and toe-ended it back at the bowler

Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 2 runs, the slower ball from Ferguson, turns out to be a gentle full-toss, Dhawan went hard on the drive and mistimed the drive towards mid-off. A poor throw from Taylor gets Dhawan another run
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, 1 run, short of a length and well wide of off, Kohli runs it down towards third man for a run

Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, FOUR, lovely, simply sublime from Kohli, back of a length and well wide of off, Kohli waits on it, plays with an open face, uses the pace of Ferguson and steers it behind square on the off-side, no chance for the fielder getting across from third man

Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, FOUR, beautifully played, Ferguson is getting predictable with his line and with the angle, short and angling across the right-hander, Kohli swivels across and nails the pull over mid-wicket
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, no run, back of a length and well wide of off, punched off the back-foot to cover
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, short and at the stumps, Kohli swivels across, rolls his wrists over and pulls it down to long leg for a single
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, the slower ball from Bracewell, bowled at 114 kmph, Kohli was through with his whip, closed the bat-face and the ball rolled to cover - off the leading edge
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, too full and on Dhawan's pads, clipped past square leg for a single
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, back of a length and just outside off, Kohli drops it at his feet and calls his partner across for a quick single
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, on a length and just outside off, defended to the off-side
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, slower short ball from Ferguson, slapped straight to the fielder at cover-point
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, wide, another short ball from Ferguson, too short and sailing over Dhawan's head, called as a wide for height
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, change of pace, Ferguson rolled his fingers across the seam, pushed towards the off-side
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, wide, Ferguson isn't getting his line right, slips this one down the leg-side and it's called as a wide
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, 1 run, back of a length and on Kohli's pads, tucked in front of square on the on-side for a single
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, leg byes, FOUR, too straight from Ferguson, short of a length and on Kohli's pads, he was looking to flick and missed, brushed his pads and ran away to the long leg boundary
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, short of a length and at Dhawan's ribs, he gets inside the line and tucks it backward of square on the on-side

Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, FOUR, cracking shot, length delivery outside off, Dhawan leans forward and drives it on the up, through the gap at extra-cover and the ball scorches across the fast outfield
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, on a good length and just outside off, defended back at the bowler

Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, chance and Latham has clanged it, perhaps, should have left Guptill take the catch, but it was his call and he had the big gloves with him. Banged in short and hurried Dhawan on the pull, caught a fat top-edge towards square leg. The ball kept swirling away from the keeper and kept going away with the wind, got there in the end, but it popped out as he hit the ground
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, on a good length and at the stumps, Kohli uses his wrists and works it behind square on the on-side for a single
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, 1 run, back of a length and on Dhawan's hips, nudged behind square on the on-side for a single
Doug Bracewell to Dhawan, no run, short of a good length and just outside off, pushed back at the bowler
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 1 run, on a good length and just outside off, Kohli leans forward and drives it to the right of mid-off for a single
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, on a good length and shaping away from outside off, drew Dhawan into an expansive drive and beat his outside edge, on the bounce to the keeper
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, change of pace from Ferguson, the slower ball outside off, pushed to the off-side
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, 1 run, Ferguson shortens his length around middle, Kohli rides the bounce and nudges it in front of mid-wicket for a single
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, no run, short of a length and just outside off, Kohli prods across and defends it to the off-side
Lockie Ferguson to Kohli, no run, on a good length and angling across the right-hander, Kohli leans forward and finds cover with the drive
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, 1 run, on a good length and angling into the left-hander, clipped wide of mid-wicket for a single
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, wide, targets the yorker and bowls down the leg-side
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, outside off stump, left alone
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, 2 runs, fullish delivery outside off stump, Kohli leans forward and drives it to deep extra-cover, off the mark
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, short and on the leg stump, Kohli ducks under it
Doug Bracewell to Kohli, no run, good length delivery around the off stump, Kohli defends off the front foot

Doug Bracewell to Rohit, out Caught by Guptill!! Perfect start for NZ after the break. Short of a length delivery outside off stump, may have just moved away a tad off the pitch, but it must be said that it was a lazy push away from the body from Rohit and he edged this straight to the lone slip fielder. Bounced extra and hit him high on the bat there. Ro looked sluggish throughout, was never a 100% with his strokes or the movement in the crease today. Rohit c Guptill b Doug Bracewell 11(24) [4s-1]
Doug Bracewell to Rohit, no run, back of a length delivery outside off stump, Rohit punches it towards cover

Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, FOUR, this is great awareness of the field. Short ball outside off stump, Dhawan knows third man is very fine, so he lets the ball come and guides it nicely to the right of backward point
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, defended to cover
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, slower delivery wide outside off stump, Dhawan tries to reach out and play but gets beaten on the under edge, the ball rolls to the keeper
Lockie Ferguson to Dhawan, no run, dabbed late off the back foot to backward point, Lockie Ferguson is bowling round the wicket to Dhawan
Lockie Ferguson to Rohit, 1 run, punched towards cover for an easy run
Lockie Ferguson to Rohit, no run, good length delivery around the off stump, Rohit defends off the front foot
Southee to Dhawan, 2 runs, overpitched and on the stumps, flicked to deep mid-wicket, Ferguson hunts it down running to his right
Southee to Dhawan, no run, again the slower ball, Dhawan punches it towards cover-point

Southee to Dhawan, FOUR, too wide and Dhawan frees his arms on the drive, rolls his wrists to keep the square-drive all along the ground and beat the dive at backward point to the left, he's looking in great touch out there
Southee to Dhawan, no run, change of pace and change of angle as well (round the wicket), Dhawan defends into the off-side
Southee to Dhawan, no run, fullish fuller length outside off stump, Dhawan punches it towards cover

Southee to Dhawan, FOUR, lovely off-drive, such good timing that mid-off had absolutely no chance of cutting that off. The cross-seamed full ball from Southee, doesn't move, so lands right in the slot for Dhawan to come forward and place the ball along the ground
Boult to Rohit, 2 runs, shortish delivery from Boult, Rohit pulls but toe-ends it to deep mid-wicket, so it doesn't have the legs to find the boundary
Boult to Rohit, no run, length ball just outside off stump, Rohit defends
Boult to Rohit, no run, slower delivery on the off stump, Rohit tries to defend and gets an inside edge
Boult to Dhawan, 1 run, pushed away to cover

Boult to Dhawan, FOUR, anything on the pads on the fuller length zone to Dhawan in limited overs cricket, you are asking for trouble. There is that strong bottom hand grip in display for the whip shot and he nailed that really hard behind square on the on-side

Boult to Rohit, 1 run, this is in the airrr and the man at mid-wicket is close for the uppishly flick shot, this ball evades him, would have been a dolly had he been on the circle. Shortish delivery from Boult, Rohit mistimes the pull as it jumps on him, hit high on the bat and he got away with it
Southee to Rohit, 1 run, played off the outer half of the bat to third man

Southee to Rohit, FOUR, he's had enough, jumps down the pitch and takes the attack to the bowler, goes for the lofted on-drive, but mistimes it past the non-striker, mid-on is very wide and he had no chance
Southee to Rohit, no run, the yorker now from Southee, Rohit digs it out
Southee to Rohit, no run, hit on the pad as Rohit misses the flick shot, good length delivery angled in, but was missing leg stump

Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, driven off the front foot, but it was thickish edge that rolls along the ground to third man, 5000 ODI runs for Shikhar Dhawan - the second fastest Indian to the milestone. Gets a cheer from the crowd and he raises his bat
Southee to Dhawan, no run, another slower delivery outside off stump, Dhawan leans forward and pushes it towards cover
Boult to Rohit, no run, good length delivery around the off stump, Rohit defends
Boult to Rohit, no run, nice and solid behind the line to defend

Boult to Dhawan, leg byes, 1 run, clever bowling from Boult, as a batsman, you don't expect a new ball bowler to bowl slower balls early. Dhawan was completely deceived by the lack of pace on this low full toss, played the flick early, hit on the pad but was missing leg stump
Boult to Dhawan, no run, now Dhawan wants to tap the ball with soft hands for a quick single, but he defended this right beside the pitch and it rolled towards the man at slip
Boult to Dhawan, no run, oh the slower ball, Dhawan was early on the pull shot and he missed this completely, sneaked under the bat, could so easily have been a chop on
Boult to Dhawan, no run, good length delivery on the stumps, Dhawan defends into the off-side
Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, fuller one outside off, Dhawan bunts it to mid-off and pinches a single

Southee to Dhawan, FOUR, leading edge but it's over the infield! For a moment, Dhawan would have been nervy as he got done in by bounce while trying the flick. Fortunately, it clears backward point and races away
Southee to Dhawan, no run, width on offer and Dhawan drives on the up. Santner at cover puts in a superb save to stop a boundary
Southee to Dhawan, no run, cracker of a ball! Southee is getting late swing. Nearly a yorker and Dhawan was on the move. Just about managed to jam it out
Southee to Dhawan, no run, pitched up closer to off stump, Dhawan leans forward and defends to cover
Southee to Dhawan, no run, very full and attacking the stumps, Dhawan shuffles a bit and somehow manages to dig it out to cover
Boult to Rohit, no run, pace and carry on offer. The away angler from Boult and slants across Rohit from outside off. Left alone as Latham gathers it near his chest
Boult to Rohit, no run, shortish and outside off, stands tall to defend to the off-side
Boult to Rohit, no run, inside edge saves Rohit! Full and angling in from around off, he pushes with hard hands and is rapped on the back thigh
Boult to Rohit, no run, very full and wide, Rohit squeezes it out towards th off-side
Boult to Dhawan, 1 run, back of a length and Dhawan punches it off the back foot towards extra cover. Called for the single early
Boult to Dhawan, no run, strong LBW shout but not given. Probably the angle is taking it down leg. Was fullish and slanting into Dhawan who missed the flick to be rapped on the pads
Southee to Rohit, no run, fullish outswinger with a hint of shape, carefully defended off the front foot by Rohit
Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, shortish and outside off, crunched off the back foot but stopped well at point

Southee to Rohit, 1 run, sharp run pinched. Rohit had to hurry but the throw is eventually into his body. Direct hit could have got him! Was a firm push from him and he got an inside edge just past leg stump. They went for the single and Latham tried his best with a quick throw
Southee to Rohit, no run, fuller and angling in on off stump, blocked out to mid-wicket
Southee to Rohit, no run, slight mix up in the running. Rohit got a leading edge past Southee towards mid-on and initially called Dhawan for a run before sending him back
Southee to Dhawan, 1 run, wide half volley and Dhawan drove this well towards extra cover who got a hand on it albeit not a clean gathering. They decide against the second run
Boult to Rohit, no run, shortish and angling across Rohit who stabs this towards point
Boult to Dhawan, 1 run, very full and on the pads, glanced away down to fine leg
Boult to Dhawan, no run, angling in from outside off, patted back down the track to Boult
Boult to Dhawan, no run, on a good length outside off, this time Dhawan is solid in his front foot defence
Boult to Dhawan, no run, squares up Dhawan a bit with this full ball that was angling into him. Just moves a fraction off the pitch. Sliced to cover
Boult to Rohit, 1 run, starts with a leg stumpish delivery that's glanced down to fine leg
